price: 65. En (gedenk) de Dag dat (Allah) hen zal roepen en zeggen: “Wat voor antwoord gaven jullie aan de boodschappers?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
